# Getting Started


# Installing and loading R packages

sfdep package allows us to perform colocation methods
```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, tidyverse, sfdep)
```



```{r}
studyArea <- st_read(dsn="data",
                     layer="study_area") %>% st_transform(crs=3829)
```

```{r}
stores <- st_read(dsn="data",
                     layer="stores") %>% st_transform(crs=3829)
```
[reference this for take home 1]
[always plot polygon then points so points will not be blocked by polygon]
[plotting functional and non-functional water point]
```{r}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(studyArea) +
  tm_polygons() +
tm_shape(stores) +
  tm_dots(col = "Name", 
          size = 0.01,
          border.col="black",
          border.lwd=0.5  )
tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(12,16))
```
